title: Alarm
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a tiny bell and a piece of fine silver wire)

text | Choose a door, window, or an area within range that is no larger than a 20-foot cube. Until the spell ends, an alarm alerts you whenever a Tiny or larger creature touches or enters the warded area. You can designate creatures to not trigger the alarm.
text | A mental alarm alerts you if you are within 1 mile and wakes you if sleeping.
text | An audible alarm produces a bell sound for 10 seconds within 60 feet

title: Alter Self
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | You can choose Aquatic Adaptation, Change Appearance, or Natural Weapons for the spell's duration.
text | Aquatic Adaptation allows you to breathe underwater and grants a swim speed equal to walking speed
text | Change Appearance allows you to change the way others perceive you, but cannot change to another creature type or size.
text | Natural Weapons grants you fangs, claws or the like to use as a natural attack with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage.

title: Animate Dead
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a drop of blood, a piece of flesh, and a pinch of bone dust)

text | You animate a pile of bones or a corpse into an undead that follows your commands. As a bonus action you mentally command any creature made by this spell if it is within 60 feet of you. You must recast this every 24 hours to maintain it for up to 4 creatures.
text | For each slot level above 3rd this spell animates or maintains control over 2 additional creatures.

title: Animate Objects
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You animate up to ten objects within range. Medium objects count as 2, Large as 4, and Huge as 8. The objects attack when mentally commanded using a slam attack (listed on separate card) Animated objects can move up to 30 feet per round.
text | You animate two additional objects for each slot level above 5th used for this spell.

title: Animated Objects' Stats
contents: text | Tiny objects: HP 20; AC 18; STR 4; DEX 18; +8 to hit, 1d4 +4 damage
text | Small objects: HP 25; AC 16; STR 6; DEX 14; +6 to hit, 1d8 +2 damage
text | Medium objects: HP 40; AC 13; STR 10; DEX 12; +5 to hit, 2d6 +1 damage
text | Large objects: HP 50; AC 10; STR 14; DEX 10; +6 to hit, 2d10 +2 damage
text | Huge objects: HP 80; AC 10; STR 18; DEX 6; +8 to hit, 2d12 +4 damage

title: Antimagic Field
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of powdered iron or iron filings)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | A 10-foot sphere surrounds you in which magic does not function. Spells can't be case, summoned creatures disappear, and magic items become mundane within sphere.
text | Spells are suppressed within the sphere, but still consume their duration, and resume when the sphere no longer suppresses them.
text | Artifacts and deity magic are unaffected by this spell.

title: Antipathy/Sympathy
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a lump of alum soaked in vinegar for Antipathy or honey for Sympathy)
text | You select a Huge or smaller creature or an area of no more than a 200-foot cube and a type of intelligent creature.
text | For Antipathy the selected creature type must make a Wisdom saving throw or must flee the target of the spell until it is out of sight for the duration.
text | For Sympathy the selected creature type must make a Wisdom saving throw or must draw closer to the target of the spell for the duration.

title: Arcane Eye
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of bat fur)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | You create an invisible floating eye that you can receive visual information from for the duration. The eye can be moved up to 30 feet per round and has no limit on how far away from you it can be, It cannot pass through solid objects, but can fit through a space as small as a 1-inch square. The eye has darkvision out to 30 feet.

title: Arcane Gate
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You create a set of two linked portals: one within 10 feet of you and one up to 500 feet away. The portal is 10 feet wide and can only be entered from one direction. The portal is invisible from behind and cannot be entered thusly. The portals can be rotated as a bonus action.

title: Arcane Lock
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (gold dust worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes)

text | You choose a door, window, gate, chest, or other entryway and lock it magically. You can designate any number of creatures that can open it normally and can also designated a password that unlocks the object if spoken within 5 feet of it. Casting Knock on the object suppresses this effect for 10 minutes.
text | When affected by this spell the object's DC to pick or break is increased by 10.

title: Astral Projection
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (for each creature affected, you must provide a jacinth worth 10,000 gp and one ornately carved silver bar worth 100 gp)
text | You and up to eight willing creatures project your astral selves into the Astral Plane.
text | Creatures are returned to their bodies when either: dismissed by you as an action; their astral bodies or regular bodies are dropped to 0 HP.
text | Your projections can enter other planes, transporting your bodies with you to the new Plane.

title: Bestow Curse
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | The creature touched must make a Wisdom saving throw or receives one of the following effects: Disadvantage on checks and saves with on ability score; disadvantage on attack rolls against you; target makes a wisdom saving throw every turn or does nothing; or you spells and attacks deal an extra 1d8 damage.
text | The duration goes up to 10 minutes with a 4th level slot, 8 hours for 5th, 24 hours for 7th, and until dispelled for 9th.

title: Bigby's Hand
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (an eggshell and a snakeskin glove)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A Large hand with an AC 20, STR 26, and DEX 10 appears within range. It can move up to 60 feet per round and can attack with a punch (melee spell attack, 4d8 force damage), a push (Strength vs Athletics), a grab (Strength to grapple, 2d6 + spell ability mod damage).
text | Damage dealt by the fist and grasp deal an extra die of damage for each slot level above 5th used.

title: Blade Ward
contents: text | Until the end of your next turn you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.

title: Blight
contents: text | A target within range must make a Constitution save. On a failure it takes 8d8 necrotic damage and half damage on a success. This has no effect on undead or constructs.
text | If you target a plant creature or magical plant it makes the Constitution save at disadvantage. Nonmagical plants get no saving throw and simply withers and dies.
text | The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th used for this spell.

title: Blindness/Deafness
contents: text | One creature within range must make a Constitution saving throw. If it fails it is blinded or deafened (your choice) for the duration. The creature can make a new save on each of its turns to end this effect.
text | You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Blink
contents: text | At the start of every turn for the duration, rill 1d20. On a roll of 11 or higher you disappear into the Ethereal Plane. At the start of your next turn, and when the spell ends, you reappear in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of where you disappeared.

title: Blur
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | Your body blurs and is obscured. All creatures who attack you during the duration suffer disadvantage. Creatures who do not rely on sight or who can see through illusions are immune to this effect.

title: Burning Hands
contents: text | All creatures within a 15-foot cone in front of you take 3d6 fire damage, but take half damage on a successful Dexterity saving throw. This also ignites all flammable objects in range as well.
text | The damage dealt by this spell increases by 1d6 for every slot level above 1st used during casting.

title: Chain Lightning
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of fur; a piece of amber, glass, or a crystal rod; and three silver pins)

text | A bolt of lightning strikes a target within range, then lances out to strike up to three additional targets within 30 feet of the first. Creatures struck by this take 10d8 damage, halved by a successful Dexterity saving throw.
text | An additional bolt of lightning  leaps from the first target to additional targets for each slot level above 6th used.

title: Charm Person
contents: text | You target one creature within range. That creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. If it fails it regards you as friendly for the duration or until you or an ally cause harm to it. When the duration ends the creature is aware it was charmed by you.
text | You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Chill Touch
contents: text | Make a ranged spell attack against a creature within range. The target takes 1d8 necrotic damage and can't regain HP until the start of your next turn. If this hits an undead target, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
text | This spell's damage increases to 2d8 at 5th level, 3d8 at 11th, and 4d8 at 17th.

title: Chromatic Orb
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a diamond worth 50 gp)
text | Make a ranged spell attack. This spell deals 2d8 cold, fire, electricity, acid, poison, or thunder damage (your choice).
text | The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Circle of Death
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (the powder of a crushed black pearl worth at least 500 gp)
text | Negative energy radiates out to 60 feet from a point you designate within range. Creatures within the area take 8d6 necrotic damage, halved on a successful Constitution saving throw.
text | The damage increases by 2d6 for each slot level above 6th used to cast this spell.

title: Clairvoyance
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a focus worth at least 100 gp, either a jeweled horn for hearing or a glass eye for seeing)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | An invisible sensor appears in the place of your choosing that you can choose to either hear or see through.

title: Clone
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a diamond worth at least 1,000 gp and at least 1 cubic inch of flesh from a creature, and a vessel large enough to hold a Medium creature)

text | This spell creates an inert duplicate that is formed inside a sealed vessel and reaches maturity after 120 days. If the target of the spell dies after the clone reaches maturity its soul is transferred to the clone.

title: Cloud of Daggers
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a sliver of glass)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | You fill a 5-foot cube with spinning daggers for the duration. Creatures who enter the area or start their turn there take 4d4 slashing damage.
text | The damage increases by 2d4 for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Cloudkill
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You fill a 20-foot radius area within range with yellow-green fog. Creatures who enter or start their turn in the fog take 5d8 poison damage, but can make a Constitution saving throw for half damage.
text | The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell.

title: Color Spray
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of powder or sand that is colored red, yellow, and blue)

text | Roll 6d10 to start this spell, it affects this many creatures in HP in a 15-foot cone in front of you. Starting with the creature with the lowest current HP, each creature affected by this spell is blinded for the duration. To be affected a creature must have equal to or less than the value remaining from the initial roll.
text | This spell affects an additional 2d10 HP for each slot level above 1st used.

title: Comprehend Languages
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of soot and salt)
text | For the duration you understand the literal meaning of any language spoken near you and can read any language written, provided you are touching the surface on which it is written.

title: Cone of Cold
contents: property | Components | V, S, M ( a small crystal or glass cone)

text | A 60-foot cone of cold air erupts from your hands, dealing 8d8 cold damage to all creatures within the area. Creatures make a Constitution saving throw to take half damage. Creatures killed by this spell become frozen statues.
text | The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell.

title: Confusion
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (three nut shells)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Creatures within a 10-foot radius sphere centered on a spot within range make a Wisdom save. On a failure, a creature must roll 1d10 at the start of its turn to determine its action.
text | 1: Creature moves in a random direction; 2-6: The creature makes no movement or action; 7-8: Creature attacks a random nearby creature; 9-10: The creature moves and attacks normally.
text | The radius of influence increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 4th used to cast this spell.

title: Conjure Elemental
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (burning incense for air, soft clay for earth, sulfur and phosphorous for fire, or water and sand for water)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | You conjure an elemental of the chosen type and CR5 or lower in an unoccupied space within range. The elemental is friendly toward you and your allies and obeys your commands.
text | The CR of the summoned elemental increases by 1 for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell.

title: Conjure Minor Elementals
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | You summon: 1 elemental of CR2 or lower; 2 elementals of CR1 or lower; 4 elementals of CR1/2 or lower; or 8 elementals of CR1/4 or lower. These are friendly toward you and follow your commands.
text | When using a 6th-level slot to cast this spell, twice as many elementals appear, when using an 8th-level slot, three times as many appear.

title: Contact Other Plane
contents: text | You contact a demigod or other extraplanar being and can ask up to 5 questions with one-word answers. When casting the spell, you must make a DC15 Intelligence saving throw or take 6d6 psychic damage and become insane until your next long rest. When insane you cannot take actions and speak only in gibberish.

title: Contingency
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a statuette of yourself carved from ivory worth at least 1,500 gp)

text | You cast this spell along with another spell of 5th level or lower and set a condition. When the condition is met, the second spell takes effect on you, even if it normally has the ability to affect other creatures.

title: Continual Flame
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (ruby dust worth 50 gp, which the spell consumes)
text | A flame the equivalent in brightness to a torch is created. It gives off no heat and doesn't consume oxygen. A Continual Flame can be hidden or covered but never quenched.

title: Control Water
contents: property | V, S, M (a drop of water and a pinch of dust)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You take control of a 100-foot cube of standing water within range and manipulate it with: Flood, creating a 20-foot rise in water level; Part Water, making a trench; Redirect Flow, even over and around obstacles; or Vortex. Creatures can escape the Vortex with a Athletics saving throw, but take 2d8 bludgeoning damage every round they are in the vortex.

title: Control Weather
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (Burning incense and bits of earth and wood mixed with water)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 8 hours
text | You take control of the weather within a 5-mile radius. You can alter the condition of the weather over the course of 1d4 x 10 minutes as often as you wish for the duration.

title: Counterspell
contents: property | Casting time | 1 reaction, which you take while within 60 feet of a spell being cast
text | A creature within 60 feet of you attempting to cast a spell of 3rd level or lower fails. If the spell is 4th level or higher, you roll a spell check with a DC of 10 + the spell's level.
text | When you cast this spell using a slot of higher than 3rd level, the interrupted spell has no effect if it is equal to or lower in level to the slot used.

title: Create Undead
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (one clay pot full of grave dirt, one with brackish water, and an onyx worth 150 gp for each corpse)

text | You can only cast this spell at night. You choose up to three medium or small corpses and turn them into Ghouls under your command. You must cast this spell again within 24 hours or the Ghouls will stop obeying you.
text | You can create and maintain additional creatures and creature types with higher slot levels.

title: Creation
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a tiny piece of matter of the type you wish to create)
text | You pull shadow material from Shadowfell to create matter no larger than a 5-foot cube.
text | Vegetable matter: 1 day; Stone or Crystal: 12 hours; Precious metals: 1 hour; Gems: 10 minutes; or Adamantine or Mithral: 1 minute.
text | The size of the cube created grows by 5 feet for every slot level above 5th used to cast this spell.

title: Crown of Madness
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | The target creature is charmed by you unless it passes a Wisdom saving throw. If charmed, the target must use its action before movement to attack a nearby creature that you designate. You must maintain the spell as an action each turn and the target can make a new Wisdom saving throw at the end of each round to end the spell.

title: Dancing Lights
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of phosphorous or wychwood, or a glowworm)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You create up to 4 torch-sized lights within range, each shedding light in a 10-foot radius. You can move the lights up to 60 feet per round as a bonus action, but the lights must remain within range of the spell and within 20 feet of each other.

title: Darkness
contents: property | Components | V, M (bat fur and a drop of pitch or piece of coal)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | a 15-foot radius sphere of darkness emanates from a point or object you designate within range. Darkvision and nonmagical light cannot pierce it. Completely covering the source of the darkness suppresses the effect.

title: Darkvision
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (either a pinch of dried carrot or an agate)
text | Touched creature gains Darkvision out to 60 feet for the duration.

title: Delayed Blast Fireball
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You point at a spot and a tiny yellow light appears there for as long as you concentrate or release the effect. When the effect ends, the bead detonates out to a 20-foot radius damaging all creatures in range. Creatures make a Dexterity save for half damage. This deals 12d6 fire damage, increasing by 1d6 for each round the bead remains undetonated.
text | The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 7th used to cast this spell.

title: Demiplane
contents: text | You create a door to a demiplane within range. The demiplane consists of a 30-foot cubed room. When the spell ends the doorway to the demiplane disappears and all creatures, inside and out, remain where they are. Subsequent castings of this spell can connect to the same demiplane or a new one.

title: Detect Magic
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura and determine the school of magic, if any.

title: Detect Thoughts
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a piece of copper)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You are able to read the surface thoughts of any creature within 30 feet using this spell. You can focus, as an action, to delve deeper into a creature's thoughts. This can be used to determined if there are creatures with readable thoughts within 30 feet of you, even unseen.

title: Dimension Door
contents: text | You and up to one willing medium-sized creature within 5 feet of you are instantly teleported to a designated spot within range. If you would arrive in a space already occupied by a creature, you and any creature you take with you take 4d6 force damage and the spell fails.

title: Disguise Self
contents: text | You change your appearance to that of your choosing, so long as it is still humanoid and no more than 1 foot taller or shorter than your natural height. This does not stand up to physical inspection.
text | To discern that you are disguised, a creature must spend an action and succeed on an Investigation check.

title: Disintegrate
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a lodestone and a pinch of dust)

text | A thin green ray shoots from your finger, dealing 10d6 + 40 force damage to the target. Creatures struck can make a Dexterity saving throw for half damage. If this spell reduces a creature to 0 HP, it disintegrates into a pile of fine dust.
text | This deals an additional 3d6 damage for each slot level above 6th used to cast this spell.

title: Dispel Magic
contents: text | A single 3rd-level or lower spell effect within range chosen by you is dispelled. For 4th-level and higher effects, you must make a DC 10 + the spell's level check to dispel it.
text | This automatically dispels a spell effect of an equal or lower level of the slot level used to cast it.

title: Dominate Monster
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You take control of any creature within range, barring a successful Wisdom saving throw. You can order it telepathically or take precise control over it with an action. The creature gets a new saving throw whenever it takes damage.
text | The duration increases to "concentration, up to 8 hours" if a 9th-level slot is used to cast this spell.

title: Dominate Person
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You take control of a humanoid within range that you can see, barring a successful Wisdom saving throw. You can control the humanoid telepathically or take precise control over it with an action. Each time the humanoid takes damage, it gets another saving throw.
text | The spell's duration increases to 10 minutes if a 6th level slot is used, 1 hour for a 7th level slot, or 8 hours with an 8th level slot.

title: Drawmij's Instant Summons
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a sapphire worth 1,000 gp)

text | You inscribe a rune on an object weighing no more than 10 points. When you crush the ruby and speak the name of the item inscribed it instantly appears in your hands, or provides the location of the item if it is being held by another creature.

title: Dream
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a handful of sand, a dab of ink, and a writing quill plucked from a sleeping bird)

text | You target any creature that is known to you that is on the same plane of existence. You, or a willing creature you touch, appears to the subject in a dream as a messenger. You can choose to make the messenger monstrous. Doing so deals 3d6 psychic damage to the subject upon waking up, barring a successful Wisdom saving throw.

title: Enlarge/Reduce
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of powdered iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | The target is enlarged or reduced by one size category for the duration. If Enlarged, its weapon attacks deal an extra 1d4 damage and has advantage on Strength checks and saving throws. If Reduced, its weapon attacks deal 1d4 less damage and has disadvantage on Strength saves and checks.
text | An unwilling target gets a Constitution saving throw to resist the effects of this spell.

title: Etherealness
contents: text | You partially enter the Ethereal Plane, allowing you to move through solid objects and even move in any direction for the duration.
text | If you cast this spell using a slot of 8th level or higher, you can target up to three willing creatures for each slot level above 7th used.

title: Evard's Black Tentacles
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a piece of tentacle from a giant squid or giant octopus)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | Black tentacles fill up a 20-foot square within range of the spell, creating difficult terrain. Creatures who enter or start their turn in the affected area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, they are restrained by the tentacles and take 3d6 bludgeoning damage. Creatures who start their turn restrained take 2d6 bludgeoning damage and can then choose to make either a Strength or Dexterity check to break free.

title: Expeditious Retreat
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | You can use the Dash action immediately upon casting this spell, and can then use the Dash action as a bonus action each turn for the duration.

title: Eyebite
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | You target one creature per turn up to 60 feet away to receive one of the following effects, negated by a Wisdom saving throw:
text | Asleep: target falls unconscious, can be awoken by damage or another creature using an action to wake it.
text | Panicked:  target uses the Dash action to move as far away from you as possible
text | Sickened: target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, but can attempt a new save each round.

title: Fabricate
contents: text | You take raw materials and fabricate a Large object in a 10-foot cube or up to 8 connected 5-foot cubes. If you are working with Stone, metal, or some other mineral substance, the fabricated product can be no larger than Medium.

title: False Life
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small amount of alcohol or distilled spirits)
text | You gain 1d4 +4 temporary hit points for the duration.
text | You gain 5 additional temporary hit points for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Fear
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a white feather or the heart of a hen)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | You project a phantasmal image in front of you. Each creature in a 30-foot cone must make a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for the duration.

text | A frightened creature must take the Dash action to move away from you by the safest route on its turn. If it ends its turn in a place that does not have line of sight to you, it gets another Wisdom saving throw against this spell.

title: Feather Fall
contents: property | Casting time | 1 reaction, when you or a creature within 60 feet falls
property | Components | V, S, M (a small feather or piece of down)

text | Choose up to five falling creatures within range. Affected creatures falling speed becomes 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, ending the effect for that creature.

title: Feeblemind
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a handful of clay, crystal, glass, or mineral spheres)

text | The target takes 4d6 psychic damage and must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target's Intelligence and Charisma scores become 1. It can no longer cast spells or understand language, nor can it communicate in an intelligible way. It can still identify friends and act to protect them.
text | Every 30 days, the creature can attempt the saving throw again to end the effect.

title: Feign Death
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of graveyard dirt)
text | You touch a willing creature and put it into a state of sleep similar to death. To all outward examinations, the creature is dead for the duration of the spell.

title: Find Familar
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (10 gp worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brazier)
text | You summon a familiar that is bonded to you in the form of a tiny animal. A familiar can deliver touch spells for you if desired.

title: Finger of Death
contents: text | One creature within range takes 7d8 + 30 necrotic damage, and can make a Constitution saving throw for half damage. A humanoid killed by this spell is raised at the start of your next turn as a zombie permanently under your control.

title: Fireball
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)

text | A 20-foot explosion of fire erupts from the target point, dealing 8d6 fire damage to all creatures within the area. Creatures make a Dexterity saving throw for half damage. Unattended flammable objects catch fire.
text | An additional 1d6 damage is dealt for each slot level above 3rd used to cast this spell.

title: Fire Bolt
contents: text | Make a Ranged spell attack. On hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. If this strikes an unattended flammable object, it catches on fire.
text | This spell's damage increases to 2d10 at 5th level, 3d10 at 11th, and 4d10 at 17th.

title: Fire Shield
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of phosphorous or a firefly)
text | Flames envelop you, shedding bright light in a 10-foor radius around you. You can choose a warm shield or cold shield.

text | A warm shield grants you resistance to cold damage and deals 2d8 fire damage to a creature that strikes you. A cold shield grants fire resistance and deals 2d8 cold damage to creatures that strike you.

title: Flaming Sphere
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A 5-foot diameter sphere of fire appears where you designate. Creatures that end their turn within 5 feet of the sphere take 2d6 fire damage, Dexterity save for half damage. On your turn you can spend a bonus action to direct the sphere and move it up to 30 feet.
text | The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Flesh to Stone
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of lime, water, and earth)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A creature within range must make a Constitution saving throw or start to turn into a statue. If the target fails its initial Constitution save, it then must make a Constitution save every round until it either passes or fails three times. If it passes three times the effect ends. If it fails three times it is turned to stone for the duration. If you maintain your concentration for the duration, the creature remains a statue until dispelled.

title: Fly
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a wing feather from any bird)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | The touched subject gains a fly speed of 60 feet for the duration. The creature falls if it is still aloft when the effect ends and it can't prevent itself from falling.
text | You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd used to cast this spell.

title: Fog Cloud
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | You create a 20-foot radius cloud of fog centered on a point you designate within range. It lasts for the duration or until a moderate wind disperses it.
text | The radius of the cloud is extended by 20 feet for each slot level above first used to cast this spell.

title: Forcecage
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (ruby dust worth 1,500 gp)

text | You create a cage (20 feet per side) or box (10 feet per side) of force to trap a creature or creatures inside. Creatures trapped cannot leave by nonmagical means and must succeed on a Charisma saving throw when attempting to leave through magical means. A failed Charisma save makes the spell attempted lost as well.

title: Foresight
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a hummingbird feather)

text | You bestow a limited ability to see into the immediate future on a touched creature. This creature has advantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws for the duration. Additionally, all attack rolls against the creature have disadvantage for the duration.
text | This spell ends if you cast it again before the effect expires.

title: Friends
contents: property | Components | S, M (a small amount of makeup applied during casting)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You have advantage on all Charisma checks directed at one creature of your choice for the duration. When the spell ends, the creature knows it was magically manipulated and becomes hostile toward you.

title: Gaseous Form
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of gauze and a wisp of smoke)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | You transform a willing creature touched into a cloud for the duration. The creature can only fly, and only 10 feet per round. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution checks and can pass through small holes and narrow openings. The creature cannot attack or cast spells while in gaseous form.

title: Gate
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a diamond worth at least 5,000 gp)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You open a gate to another Plane of existence within range. The portal lasts for the duration and any creature can pass through it from one plane to the other. When you cast the spell, you may name a specific creature. If that creature is on the plane you are creating a Gate to, the portal opens next to it and draws it through to your plane. You have no control over it, however.

title: Gaes
contents: text | The targeted creature is given a service or task by you. It must make a Wisdom save to resist this effect. On a failed save, the creature must act to carry out the task demanded. The creature takes 5d10 psychic damage each time it performs an action that is counter to your instructions.
text | If you use a 7th or 8th level slot for this spell, the duration becomes 1 year. If you use a 9th level slot, it becomes permanent.

title: Gentle Repose
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of salt and one copper piece for each of the corpse's eyes)
text | A corpse you touch does not decay and cannot be turned into an undead for the duration. This also effectively extends the time limit on the spell Raise Dead

title: Globe of Invulnerability
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a glass or crystal bead that shatters when the spell ends)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A shimmering barrier appears in a 10-foot radius around you. Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier cannot affect those inside it, even if the spell is cast using a higher slot level.
text | The barrier blocks one slot level higher for each slot level above 6th used to cast this spell.

title: Glyph of Warding
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (incense and powdered diamond worth at least 200 gp)
property | Duration | Until dispelled or triggered

text | You inscribe a glyph on a surface or object and set a trigger condition for it. The glyph either explodes dealing 5d8 elemental damage in a 20-ft. radius (DEX half) or triggers a spell of 3rd level or lower.
text | Damage and spell slots increase by 1d8 or 1 level for each slot level above 3rd used to cast this spell.

title: Grease
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of pork rind or butter)

text | A 10-foot radius area of grease appears centered on a spot within range. All creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. Creatures who enter or end their turn in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

title: Greater Invisibility
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | You or a creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person.

title: Guards and Wards
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (burning incense, brimstone, oil, a knotted string, umber hulk blood, and a silver rod worth 10 gp)

text | up to 2,500 square feet is warded. Corridors fill with fog, doors are magically locked, stairways are filled with webs, and other effects of your choice. This effect can become permanent if cast every day for 1 year.
text | Dispel Magic can only remove one of these effects at a time.

title: Gust of Wind
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a legume seed)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A blast of wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in the direction you choose. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must make a Strength saving throw of be pushed 15 feet in the direction the wind is blowing. This wind disperses vapors and has a 50% chance to snuff out protected fires. You can redirect the wind each round as a bonus action.

title: Hallucinatory Terrain
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a stone, a twig, and a bit of green plant)

text | A 150-foot cube within range is changed to look, sound, and smell like another type of terrain. Creatures entering the terrain can tell it is not real, and an Investigation check can be used to discern an illusion.

title: Haste
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a shaving of licorice root)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A willing creature within range has its speed doubled, gains +2 to AC, has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and gains an additional action on each of its turns. That extra action can only be used to Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object.
text | When the effect ends, the creature cannot move or take actions until after its next turn.

title: Hold Monster
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small, straight piece of iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | A creature within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the creature can make a new saving throw to end the effect.
text | You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 5th used to cast this spell. All creatures targeted must be within 30 feet of each other.

title: Hold Person
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small, straight piece of iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A humanoid within range must make a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. A paralyzed humanoid can attempt a new saving throw at the end of each of its turns to end this effect.
text | You can target one additional humanoid for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell. All targets must be within 30 feet of each other.

title: Hypnotic Pattern
contents: property | Components | S, M (a glowing stick of incense or a crystal vial filled with phosphorescent material)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A hypnotic weave appears in a 30-foot cube within range. All creatures who see the pattern must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature becomes charmed for the duration. Creatures charmed this way are considered incapacitated and have a speed of 0. Damaging an affected creature ends the effect for that creature.

title: Ice Storm
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of dust and a few drops of water)

text | A 20-foot radius, 40-foot tall cylinder area within range becomes difficult terrain for 1 round. Any creature in that area takes 2d8 bludgeoning damage and 4d6 cold damage, halved with a successful Dexterity saving throw.
text | The bludgeoning damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th used to cast this spell.

title: Identify
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pearl worth at least 100 gp)

text | You learn the magical properties of any item you hold while casting this spell, as well as how to use those properties. You learn what spells are affecting the object, as well as whether it was created by a spell or not, and which spell.
text | If you touch a creature while casting this spell instead, you learn which spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

title: Illusory Script
contents: property | Components | S, M (a lead-based ink worth at least 10 gp, which the spell consumes)
text | You write a message that appears only to those you designate when casting this spell. All others who read it see only an unintelligible gaggle of words, or a different message altogether.
text | A creature with True Sight can see the message as normal, whether designated or not.

title: Imprisonment
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a vellum depiction of the target, as well as another component worth at least 500 gp per HD of the target)

text | The targeted creature must make a Wisdom saving throw or be bound by this spell. Bound creatures can be: buried in a sphere of force, chained in place, banished to a tiny demiplane, shrunk to 1 inch and stuck in a gem, or put into magical slumber.
text | The spell can only be ended with a 9th-level Dispel Magic or with a condition that you set upon casting.

title: Incendiary Cloud
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A 20-foot radius sphere of fiery fog appears centered on a spot in range. Creatures in the cloud must make a Dexterity saving throw. They take 10d8 fire damage on a failed save, half on a success. They must make the saving throw and take damage when entering the area or ending their turn in it.

title: Invisibility
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (an eyelash encased in gum arabic)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | A creature you touch becomes invisible for the duration. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is also invisible. The spell ends if the target attacks or casts a spell.
text | You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Jump
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a grasshopper's hind leg)
text | Touched creature's jump distance is tripled for the duration.

title: Knock
contents: text | A mundane locked item is unlocked, unstuck, or unbarred. An arcane lock is suppressed for 10 minutes. This spell produces a knocking sound audible up to 300 feet away.

title: Legend Lore
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (incense worth 250 gp, and four ivory strips worth 50 gp each)
text | You find out information about a legendary figure or item that you name. The lore is always accurate, but possibly vague.

title: Leomund's Secret Chest
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (an exquisite chest worth at least 5,000 gp and a tiny replica worth 50 gp)

text | You hide a chest in the Ethereal Plane. You can summon it by touching the replica to recall it, sending it back the same way. After 60 days there is a cumulative 5% chance that the spell effect ends. If the chest is in the Ethereal Plane when this effect ends, it is irretrievably lost.

title: Leomund's Tiny Hut
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small crystal bead)

text | A 10-foot dome of force appears around and above you. Up to nine creatures plus you can fit inside the dome. Spells and other effects cannot be cast into or through the dome and you can control how bright it is inside.

title: Levitate
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (small leather loop or piece of golden wire)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | One creature or object of your choice floats up to 20 feet up for the duration. A creature can move only by pushing or pulling along a solid object, like climbing. You can change the target's altitude by 20 feet per round. If you are the target, you can move up or down as part of your movement.

title: Light
contents: property | Components | V, M (a firefly or phosphorescent moss)
text | You touch an object that is no larger than 10 feet in any one dimension. That object shines brightly for 20 feet, and dimly for 20 feet beyond that.

title: Lightning Bolt
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass)
text | A bolt of lightning lances out from you in a line 100 feet long by 5 feet wide. Creatures in the path take 8d6 lightning damage, Dexterity save for half damage.
text | The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd used to cast this spell.

title: Locate Creature
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of fur from a bloodhound)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you, You sense the direction to the creature's location if that creature is within 1,000 feet of you.

title: Locate Object
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a forked twig)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. If that object is within 1,000 feet of you then you know the direction and distance to it.

title: Longstrider
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of dirt)
text | Touched creature's speed increases by 10 feet for the duration.
text | You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Mage Armor
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a piece of cured leather)
text | Touched creature gains a protective magical force, granting it an AC of 13 + Dexterity modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the effect as an action.

title: Mage Hand
contents: text | A spectral, floating hand appears within range for the duration. You can move the hand up to 30 feet as an action. It can manipulate objects and open doors and containers. It cannot attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

title: Magic Circle
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (holy water or powdered silver and iron worth at least 100 gp)

text | A 10-foot radius, 20-foot tall cylinder appears and you select celestials, fey, fiends, elementals, or undead. The chosen creature cannot enter the circle, has disadvantage on those within the circle, and cannot charm or frighten those within the circle.
text | You can choose to reverse this effect to trap a creature in the circle instead.
text | The duration increases by 1 hour for each slot level above 3rd used to cast this spell.

title: Magic Jar
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a gem, crystal, reliquary, or other container worth 5,000 gp)

text | Your soul leaves your body and inhabits the container. You can attempt to possess a creature within 100 feet of the container. The target must make a Charisma save. On a failure your soul switches with that of the creature and you control its body. You can leave the possessed body and return to the container or your own body when you choose.

title: Magic Missile
contents: text | Three glowing darts of force each strike a creature of your choosing, dealing 1d4 + 1 force damage each. You can direct the darts at separate targets or all at one, as you wish.
text | One more dart is created for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Magic Mouth
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small bit of honeycomb and jade dust worth at least 10 gp)

text | You speak a message and set a trigger condition for the message to be delivered. You can choose to have the spell end when the message is delivered or repeat the message each time the trigger condition is met.

title: Magic Weapon
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | For the duration, a Weapon touched gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.
text | The bonus to attacks and damage increases to +2 with a 4th level or higher slot or +3 with a 6th level or higher slot.

title: Major Image
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of fleece)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You create an image that moves, smells, and even gives off temperature appropriate to the image it depicted. As long as you are in range of the illusion, you can control it and alter its appearance so as to appear realistic. A creature who uses its action to examine the illusion can make an Investigation check to determine the reality of the illusion.
text | If you cast this spell with a slot of 6th level or higher it does not require your concentration to be maintained.

title: Mass Suggestion
contents: property | Components | V, M (a snake's tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil)

text | You suggest a course of action and magically influence up to twelve creatures within range to perform that action. Each target makes a Wisdom saving throw or is compelled to complete the suggested task.
text | The duration increases to 10 days with a 7th level slot, 30 days with an 8th, and a year and a day with a 9th.

title: Maze
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | You banish a creature you can see within range into a labyrinthine demiplane. The target remains there until the spell expires or it escapes the maze.

text | The target can use its action to make an Intelligence check to escape the maze (a minotaur or goristro demon automatically succeeds). The target reappears in the space it left when the spell ends.

title: Melf's Acid Arrow
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach)

text | Make a ranged spell attack against a target within range. On a hit, the arrow deals 4d4 acid damage immediately and 2d4 acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss the arrow deals half of the initial damage and no secondary damage.
text | Both the initial and secondary damage increases by 1d4 for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Mending
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (two lodestones)
text | This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch. This can physically restore a magic item or construct, but cannot restore the magical abilities to such items.

title: Message
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a short piece of copper wire)
text | You point your finger at a creature within range and whisper a message. The target hears the message and can reply in a whisper that only you can hear.

title: Meteor Swarm
contents: text | Four orbs of fire hit the ground at different points you can see within range. Each orb deals 20d6 fire and 20d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures within a 40-foot radius of each impact with a Dexterity save for half damage. A creature in the area of more than one burst is only affected once.

title: Mind Blank
contents: text | For the duration, the touched target is immune to psychic damage, any effect that would read its emotions or thoughts, divination spells, and the charmed condition.

title: Minor Illusion
contents: property | Components | S, M (a bit of fleece)
text | You create a sound or image within range that lasts for the duration.

title: Mirage Arcane
contents: text | You make terrain in an area up to 1 square mile look, sound, smell and even feel like some other sort of terrain. A creature with True Sight can see through the illusion to the terrain's true form, but can still physically interact with the illusion. Any illusory object taken out of the area of effect disappears immediately.

title: Mirror Image
contents: text | Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space. Each time a creature targets you with an attack, roll 1d20 to determine whether the attack hits you or a duplicate. If all three duplicates are active, a roll of 6 or more hits a duplicate. If 2 duplicates, a roll of 8 or higher targets one. If 1 duplicate, a roll of 11 or higher targets it.

title: Mislead
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | You become invisible as an illusory double of yourself appears where you are standing. The double lasts for the duration, but your invisibility ends if you cast a spell or attack. You can use your action to direct the double up to twice your speed and make it gesture, speak and behave in any way you choose.

title: Misty Step
contents: text | Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

title: Modify Memory
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A creature that you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw or is charmed by you. While the charm lasts you can affect the target's memory of an event that happened within the last 24 hours and lasted no more than 10 minutes.

text | By using a higher slot level, you can modify an event that happened up to 7 days ago (6th level), 30 days ago (7th level), 1 year ago (8th level), or any time in the creature's past (9th level).

title: Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a tiny silver whistle, a piece of bone, and a thread)

text | You summon a phantom watchdog. Whenever a creature comes within 30 feet of it without speaking a designated password the hound starts barking loudly. The hound sees invisible creatures and even into the Ethereal Plane, and it ignores illusions. The hound can attempt to bite on your turn. It's attack bonus is your spellcasting ability modifier + your proficiency bonus. On a hit it deals 4d8 piercing damage.

title: MK's Magnificent Mansion
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a mini portal carved from ivory, polished marble, and a tiny silver spoon)
text | You create an extradimensional dwelling, complete with near-transparent servants and a banquet of food fit for up to 100 people.

title: MK's Private Sanctum
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a think sheet of lead, piece of opaque glass, wad of cotton/cloth, and powdered chrysolite)
text | You make a cub between 5 and 100 feet on a side within the area that:
text | sound cannot pass through; prevents vision into; cannot be divined into; and cannot be teleported into or out of
text | You increase the size of one side by up to 100 feet for each slot level above 4th used to cast this spell.

title: Mordenkainen's Sword
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a miniature platinum sword worth 250 gp)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A sword appears floating in the air. You can make a melee spell attack on a creature within 5 feet of the sword each turn. On a hit, the sword deals 3d10 force damage. You can move the sword up to 20 feet each round before attacking.

title: Move Earth
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (an iron blade and a small bag of soil)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 2 hours

text | You can reshape up to a 40 square foot area of terrain into any shape you want. Shaping the terrain takes 10 minutes and at the end of each 10 minute interval you can choose to reshape the area again.

title: Nondetection
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of diamond dust worth 25 gp)

text | For the duration the creature you touch cannot be targeted by divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors. This effect can also be placed over an area or object no larger than 10 feet in any dimension.

title: Nystul's Magic Aura
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small square of silk)

text | The target creature or unattended object receives either a false aura when under the gaze of Detect Magic, or changing the way the creature or object is perceived by effects like a paladin's Divine Sense.

title: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small crystal sphere)

text | A small globe of frozen energy streaks to a point within range and explodes in a 60-foot radius sphere. Creatures in the area take 10d6 cold damage, with a Constitution saving throw for half damage. Water in the area is frozen up to 6 inches thick for 1 minute.
text | The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 6th used to cast this spell.

title: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a hemispherical piece of clear crystal and gum arabic)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A sphere of force encloses a Large or smaller creature within range. An unwilling creature can attempt a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the effect. The sphere is impenetrable and immune to all damage. An enclosed creature can push against the sphere, making it roll up to half their speed.
text | A Disintegrate spell destroys the sphere without harming anything inside it.

title: Otto's Irresistable Dance
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A creature within range starts dancing in place, using all of its movement each turn to dance. Creatures immune to charm cannot be affects. Dancing creatures have disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws and attack rolls, and anyone attacking a dancing creature has advantage.
text | As an action, a dancing creature can make a Wisdom saving throw to end this effect.

title: Passwall
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of sesame seeds)

text | A passage appears at a point you choose on a surface such as a wall, ceiling, or floor. The passage can be up to 20 feet deep. Any creature inside the passage when the spell expires is safely ejected to a spot nearest to the surface.

title: Phantasmal Force
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of fleece)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You create an illusion which appears only to one creature within range. The creature can make an Intelligence saving throw upon casting to ignore this effect. At any time, the creature can make an Investigation check to discover the illusion. Otherwise the creature treats the illusion as being real in every way, and can even take damage from it.

title: Phantasmal Killer
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You tap into the deepest fears of a target within range and make an illusory manifestation of it, visible only to that creature. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for the duration. Each turn while the effect is in place, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw or take 4d10 damage. On a successful save, the spell ends.
text | The damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 4th used to cast this spell.

title: Phantom Steed
contents: text | You conjure a large horselike creature within range that you or another creature of your choosing can ride. The horse can move up to 100 feet per round and can travel 10 miles in an hour, 13 at a fast pace.

title: Planar Binding
contents: property | Components | V. S. M (a jewel worth at least 1,000 gp)

text | You bind a celestial, elemental, fiend, or fey to your service for the duration. The creature must be present for the entirety of the spellcasting and makes a Charisma saving throw. If it fails the save, it is bound to do your bidding for the duration.
text | The duration increases to 10 days if a 7th-level slot is used, 180 days for an 8th, and a year and a day for a 9th.

title: Plane Shift
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a forked metal rod worth 250 gp)

text | You and up to 8 willing creatures are transported to another plane of existence of your choosing. If you use this to banish an otherworldly creature instead, make a melee spell attack against it. On a hit, the creature must make a Charisma saving throw or be banished to a random location on the plane you choose.

title: Poison Spray
contents: text | You target a creature within range that you can see. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 damage. This spell's damage increases to 2d12 at 5th level, 3d12 at 11th level, and 4d12 at 17th level.

title: Polymorph
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a caterpillar cocoon)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | A creature within range is transformed into a new form. This new form can have a CR of up to the transformed creature's CR or level. An unwilling creature can make a Wisdom saving throw to avoid this effect.

title: Power Word Kill
contents: text | You target one creature within range. If that creature has 100 or fewer hit points, it dies instantly. If it has more than 100 hit points, this spell has no effect.

title: Power Word Stun
contents: text | You target a creature within range. If that creature has 150 hit points or less, it is stunned, otherwise the spell does nothing. On each of its turns the creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is no longer stunned.

title: Prestidigitation
contents: text | With this spell you can: create a harmless sensory effect; light or snuff a small fire or candle; clean or soil a small object; chill, warm or flavor nonliving material; make a color or mark appear on a surface for 1 hour; create a trinket in your hand until your next turn.
text | you can have up to 3 non-instantaneous effects active at once.

title: Prismatic Spray
contents: text | Each target within a 60-foot cone rolls a Dexterity saving throw and 1d8. The 1d8 roll determines the effect for that creature:

text | 1: 10d6 fire damage; 2: 10d6 acid damage; 3: 10d6 lightning damage; 4: 10d6 poison damage; 5: 10d6 cold damage; 6: target must make Constitution saves until it passes or fails 3 times. 3 failures makes it petrified; 7: target is blinded, then transported to a random plane of existence; 8: 2 other effects, roll 1d8 twice and take both.

title: Prismatic Wall
contents: text | A wall of shimmering colors appears. Creatures within 20 feet of it must make a Constitution check or be blinded. Creatures attempting to pass through it must make 7 dexterity saving throws or it takes the following effects, in order: 10d6 fire damage, 10d6 acid damage, 10d6 electric damage, 10d6 poison damage, 10d6 cold damage, restrained and then petrified, and blinded and then banished to another plane.

title: Programmed Illusion
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of fleece and jade dust worth 25 gp)
text | You set an illusion with a trigger condition. The illusion is imperceptible before it is triggered and the programmed performance can be up to 5 minutes in length.
text | When the condition you specify occurs, the illusion springs to life, performs its programmed function, then disappears and resets after 10 minutes, ready to be triggered again.

title: Project Image
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a small replica of you worth at least 5 gp)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 day

text | You create an illusory image of yourself that lasts for the duration. The illusion looks and sounds like you and can appear anywhere within range that you have seen before. As a bonus action on your turn, you can see through the illusion's eyes and move it up to 30 feet per round.

title: Protection from Energy
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | For the duration, one creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice from: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

title: Protection from Evil/Good
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (holy water or powdered silver and iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | Touched creature has protection against Aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead for the duration. Those creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against the target, the target cannot be charmed, possessed or frightened by those creature types.

title: Rary's Telepathic Bond
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (pieces of eggshell from two different kinds of creatures)

text | You forge a telepathic link with up to 8 willing creatures of your choice within range. For the duration, the targets can communicate telepathically over any distance, though not across planes of existence.

title: Ray of Enfeeblement
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | Make a ranged spell attack against a target. On a hit, the target deals half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength. The target can make a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns to end this effect.

title: Ray of Frost
contents: text | Make a ranged spell attack against a target within range. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 cold damage and has its speed reduced by 10 feet for one round. The spell's damage increases to 2d8 at 5th level, 3d8 at 11th level, and 4d8 at 17th level.

title: Ray of Sickness
contents: text | Make a ranged spell attack against a target you can see within range. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 poison damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is also poisoned until the end of your next turn.
text | The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Remove Curse
contents: text | At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end. If the object is a cursed magic item, its curse remains, but the spell breaks its attunement to the owner of the object so it can be removed or discarded.

title: Reverse Gravity
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a lodestone and iron filings)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | Gravity reverses in a 50-foot radius, 100-foot tall cylinder area centered on a spot you can see within range. A creature caught in this area can make a Dexterity saving throw to grab onto a fixed object within reach to avoid falling up. Creatures stop falling when they reach the top of the cylinder or hit a ceiling or other fixed object above them. When the spell expires, creatures in the area fall as normal.

title: Rope Trick
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (powdered corn extract and a twisted loop of parchment)

text | You touch a length of rope up to 60 feet long that then stands up straight. At the top of the rope opens an extradimensional space that can fit up to eight medium or smaller creatures. The rope can be pulled into the space to hide it as well.
text | Attacks and spells cannot pass through the extradimensional portal and anything inside the space when the spell expires drops.

title: Scorching Ray
contents: text | You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range. You can target separate creatures with each or target one creature with multiple rays. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage.
text | One additional ray is created for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Scrying
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a focus worth at least 1,000 gp)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You attempt to see and hear a particular creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence. The target makes a Wisdom save, which is modified by the target's knowledge and physical connection to you.
text | On a successful save, the spell fails and you cannot target that creature again for 24 hours. On a failure, you see all within 10 feet of the target.

title: See Invisibility
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of talc and a small sprinkling of silver powder)
text | For the duration you can see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible. You also see into the Ethereal Plane. Ethereal creatures and objects appear translucent and ghostly.

title: Seeming
contents: text | You change the appearance of up to 8 creatures within range, giving each target a new, illusory appearance. Creatures can make an Investigation check to discern the illusions for what they are.

title: Sending
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a short piece of fine copper wire)
text | You send a short message to any creature with which you are familiar. The creature hears the message in its mind and can respond immediately.
text | This can send a message across any distance and even to other planes of existence, but there is a 5% chance it fails if the recipient is on another plane.

title: Sequester
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a powder composed of diamond, emerald, ruby, and sapphire dust worth 5,000 gp)
text | A willing creature or object is hidden away. It becomes invisible and undetectable through divination. If the target is a creature it enters a state of suspended animation.
text | You can set a condition for the spell to end early. The condition must be visible and take place within 1 mile of the creature. This effect also ends if the subject takes any damage.

title: Shapechange
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (1 jade circlet worth 1,500 gp)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | For the duration, you transform into a creature that you have seen before that has a CR equal to or lower than your level. You can alter your form as an action, following the same restrictions.

title: Shatter
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a chip of mica)

text | A sudden loud, ringing noise emanates in a 10-foot radius from a point you designate within range. Creatures within the area take 2d8 thunder damage, with a Constitution saving throw for half damage.
text | The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2nd used to cast this spell.

title: Shield
contents: property | Casting time | 1 reaction, taken when hit by an attack or magic missile

text | An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn you have a +5 bonus to your AC, including against the triggering attack, and take no damage from Magic Missile.

title: Shocking Grasp
contents: text | Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage and can't take reactions until its next turn. This damage increases to 2d8 at 5th level, 3d8 at 11th level, and 4d8 at 17th level.

title: Silent Image
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a bit of fleece)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You create an image of an object or creature that is no larger than a 15-foot cube. The image gives off no sound, smells, or any other sensory effects. You can move the image as an action to any spot within range, and can manipulate it so that the movement appears normal, like a humanoid walking.
text | Creatures can make an Investigation check to discern the illusion.

title: Simulacrum
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (snow or ice in large quantity, and ruby dust worth 1,500 gp)

text | You duplicate any creature that is within range for the duration of casting. The duplicate appears to be a double of the original creature, but has half hit points and can never get stronger or learn new abilities. The simulacrum is friendly toward you and anyone you designate and obeys your spoken commands. If it is dropped to 0 HP, it melts away.

title: Sleep
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of fine sand, rose petals)

text | Roll 5d8 to determine how many hit points in creatures you can affect with this spell. Starting with the creature with the lowest hit points within 20 feet of a spot you designate within range, creatures fall asleep until all of the hit points rolled are used up.
text | Increase the hit points put to sleep by 2d8 for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Sleet Storm
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pinch of dust and a few drops of water)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | For the duration, a 20-foot radius, 40-foot tall cylinder area within range is heavily obscured and flames are doused. The ground becomes difficult terrain and all creatures who start their turn in or enter the area make a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. Creatures attempting to cast a spell in the area must make a Constitution saving throw or lose concentration.

title: Slow
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a drop of molasses)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Up to six creatures within a 40-foot cube within range must make a Wisdom saving throw of be affected by this spell.

text | Affected creatures have their speed halved, -2 to AC and Dexterity saving throws, can use either an action or bonus action on its turn (not both). Spellcasters have a chance to have the spell delayed for one turn. Affected creatures can make a Wisdom save every round to end this effect.

title: Spider Climb
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a drop of bitumen and a spider)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch has the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and hand upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free. The target gains a climb speed equal to its walking speed.

title: Stinking Cloud
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a rotten egg or several skunk cabbage leaves)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You create a 20-foot radius cloud of yellow gas centered on a spot within range. Creatures that start completely within the cloud must make a Constitution saving throw or spend their turn retching and reeling. Creatures that do not need to breathe are immune to this effect.

title: Stone Shape
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (soft clay)

text | You touch a stone object of medium size or smaller or a section of stone no more than 5 feet in any dimension and form it into any shape that suits your purpose. The object can have up to 2 hinges and a latch, but nothing more mechanically complicated than that.

title: Stoneskin
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (diamond dust worth 100 gp)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | The spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone. For the duration, the creature has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.

title: Suggestion
contents: property | Components | V, M (a snake's tongue and honeycomb or sweet oil)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 8 hours
text | You suggest a course of action for a target within range. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it performs the suggested course of action to the best of its ability.

title: Sunbeam
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a magnifying glass)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | An intense beam of light shines from your hands in a 60-foot long by 5-foot wide line. Creatures in the effect take 6d8 radiant damage and are blinded until your next turn. A successful Constitution saving throw halves the damage and negates the blindness. Undead and oozes have disadvantage on the saving throw.
text | You can create a new line of radiance as an action on each of your turns for the duration.

title: Sunburst
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (fire and a piece of sunstone)

text | Brilliant sunlight fills a 60-foot radius area within range. Creatures within the area take 12d6 radiant damage and are blinded for 1 minute. A successful Constitution saving throw halves the damage and negates the blind. Undead and oozes have disadvantage on the save.
text | Blinded creatures can make a Constitution saving throw on each of their turns to end the condition.

title: Symbol
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (mercury, phosphorous, and powdered diamond and opal worth 1,000 gp)
property | Duration | Until dispelled or triggered
text | You transcribe a glyph or rune that triggers on a condition you set and can cause: death; discord; fear; hopelessness; insanity; pain; sleep; or stunning

title: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (tiny tarts and a feather)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A creature you can see within range must make a Wisdom saving throw or falls prone in laughter and is incapacitated for the duration. Each round, and each time it takes damage, the creature can make a new Wisdom saving throw to end this effect. The target has advantage on this save if it is triggered by damage.

title: Telekinesis
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You can manipulate creatures or objects within range with your mind. If attempting to move a creature, make an ability check with your spellcasting ability opposed by the creature's Strength check. If you win you can move the creature up to 30 feet and the creature is restrained. You can move an unattended object up to 1,000 pounds up to 30 feet within the range of this spell.

title: Telepathy
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pair of linked silver rings)

text | You create a telepathic link to any creature with which you are familiar on the same plane of existence. For the duration of the spell you and the linked creature can instantaneously share mental images and thoughts.

title: Teleport
contents: text | You transport yourself and up to eight willing creatures or a 10-foot cube to a destination on the same plane of existence that is known to you.

title: Teleportation Circle
contents: property | Components | V, M (rare chalks and inks worth 50 gp)

text | You draw a 10-foot diameter circle on the ground, linking that location with a permanent teleportation circle somewhere else on the same plane of existence. You can create a permanent teleportation circle by casting this spell every day for one year.

title: Tenser's Floating Disk
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a drop of mercury)
text | You create a 3-foot wide disk of force that can hold up to 500 pounds. While this is within 20 feet of you it does not move, but will move to stay within 20 feet of you if you are traveling.

title: Thunderwave
contents: text | Creatures within a 15-foot cube of you take 2d8 thunder damage and are pushed 10 feet away. If they make a Constitution saving throw they take half damage and are not pushed.
text | The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st used to cast this spell.

title: Time Stop
contents: text | You briefly stop time for everyone but yourself. You take 1d4 +1 turns in a row, during which you can move and take actions as normal.
text | The spell ends if any of the actions you take affect another creature or an object worn by another creature, or if you move more than 1,000 feet away from where you case the spell.

title: Tongues
contents: property | Components | V, M (a small clay model of a ziggurat)
text | The touched creature gains the ability to speak and understand any language for the duration.

title: True Polymorph
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (1 drop of mercury, a dollop of gum arabic, and a wisp of smoke)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
